applicability_reasoning: This regulation does not apply to the provided pension scheme rules document for several reasons: 1) The regulation specifically pertains to telephone conversations and electronic communications relating to client order services for investment products. The document is a set of pension scheme rules that outlines the structure, benefits, and administration of a company pension life cover scheme. 2) While the document includes contact information for AIB life, it does not describe or establish procedures for recording telephone conversations or electronic communications related to investment orders. 3) The scheme described is a pure protection product (life cover) rather than an investment product - its sole purpose as stated in Section 3.4 is 'to provide benefits for the member's dependants if the member dies before normal retirement age.' 4) The document focuses on defining the scheme rules, trustee duties, and benefit calculations rather than dealing with communication recording requirements or order execution procedures. Therefore, regulation 407 regarding the recording of telephone conversations for investment orders is not applicable to this type of pension life cover scheme document.
regulation_title: Recording of telephone conversations or electronic communications
regulation_text: 407. (1) A regulated entity shall either - (a) comply with Regulations 23(5) to (12) of the MiFID Regulations 2017 and Article 76(1)(b), 76(8) and 76(10) of the MiFID Delegated Regulation, or (b) where telephone conversations or electronic communications relating to the provision of client order services that relate to offering, arranging or providing an investment product are not recorded - (i) promptly follow up the telephone conversation with a written communication to the client which confirms the key details of the telephone conversation, and (ii) provide the client with an opportunity to disagree with the content of the written communication or to otherwise stop the order being executed within a specified time -frame. (2) The written confirmation referred to in paragraph (1)(b)(i) shall include, at a minimum, the order details and the details of any recommendation in connection with that order.
source_name: CENTRAL BANK (SUPERVISION AND ENFORCEMENT) ACT 2013 (SECTION 48) (CONSUMER PROTECTION) REGULATIONS 2025
